## Filtrado

Para construir esta filogenia emplearesmo como input SNPs de un archivo VCF. 

Via al archivo

```{r cars}
bcftools view -c 1:minor -v snps -e 'F_MISSING>0.1 || QUAL<30' input.vcf -Ov -o snps_only.vcf
```

## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
plot(pressure)
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
